channel.title: About my Server
channel.description: Ok so my client is all right but if it's ok can someone tell me how to make a command for a 317 server, all my commands i try dont work? can somebody help me?

item.title: About my Server
item.dc:creator: @Dragon99999 Dragon99999
item.description:
@Dragon99999 wrote:

The simple format for a command (should be in client.java around other commands)

if(command.startsWith(“Name of command”)){
Do something in here
}

Make sure all the braces and semicolons are correct, or else you will get compiling errors.

Read full topic
